page.title: 13Fairfield nature reserve
page.content: At the bottom of our school there is the nature reserve. In our nature reserve we have one pond, a bird table, plants, animals, trees and the bird hide. The bird hide is still not quite finished yet. In winter we put bird food on the bird table. We have lots of plants like germander, speedwell, daisies, buttercups and greater stitchwort. We have lots of newts and tadpoles. We have about seven trees. There are silver birches, fir trees and an alder. The land is mostly grass. We sometimes see birds going in and out of the bird box.
